off beard & hair this part is written in steps not row it will be all one piece or round in the step end it just looked too confusing to put all in one row for you to read 1 chain 32 slip_stitch to the first stitch to join chain 1 be careful not to twist it 2 single_crochet in same chain as joining chain 1 *single_crochet in next chain chain 1* repeat 11 times 3 *single_crochet in next chain chain 3* repeat 3 times 4 single_crochet in next chain chain 5 5 repeat step 3 6 repeat step 2 until you reach the end join and bind off leaving a long tail use the tail to sew the piece to his head the long chain 5 loop is the longest part of the beard and should be in front where his chin would be you may want to pin the beard in place so it doesn t move as you sew it on when you place the
